content.detailedDescription:
I am english but live in north germany.
around 8pm - possibly a little after - from my big triangular top-floor apartment front window in norderstedt, i saw a huge pulsating glowing bright pinkish-orange oval shaped object flying extremely fast in the mostly clear sky (starting to get a bit cloudy a short time before sunset). it looked a bit like a fireball but seemed and acted more like some kind of piloted craft flying in a completely singular straight line across the sky. i was sitting at my computer desk at the time, the big window is straight in front of me. the brightness of the object and the clear view of it from my window was what caught my eye. usually i would have assumed it was a plane but it was nothing like a plane in any way, shape or form. the object was so fast, within about 20-30 seconds it was no longer within my view. i called my wife to look but by the time she got to the window it was nowhere to be seen. also, it was so fast and i was so distracted by it that i didn't have time to get my camera and take a photo which i was going to do if it had remained in vision long enough.

it seemed to be a physically solid object with possible lights although it may be the way it pulsated to make it look that way. the colour of the light was very unusual. pink-orange with a touch of red is the way i would describe it. the glowing pulsation was reminiscent of the lights on the knight rider car in that it was moving left to right very quickly. i heard no sound as it flew past. the shape is somewhere i would describe between oval, circular or discular and rectangular. it was constantly pulsating brightly and, as i said, it was moving extremely fast in a straight line across the sky. there was no trail behind it and it looked nothing like any plane/helicopter/aircraft (which we see a lot of around here since hamburg airport is not that far away). and it was certainly not a drone.

i see and hear a lot of aircraft around here but this object had no sound from what i could hear where i was situated indoors and looked nothing like either any aircraft or celestial object such as a star or comet i have seen.

when i was younger i was interested in stuff like ufos and other mysterious phenomena but in later times i've regarded most of the stuff as fake or hoaxes. the object i saw tonight has restored my belief that there are some weird things out there which can not be explained (unless, of course, the object turns out to be some kind of experimental or secret man-made craft). i seriously hope some other people in this area or anywhere else have also saw the object and possibly managed to film or photograph it.
content.summary: Around 8pm german time, a big pulsating glowing oval pink-orange object flew past in the sky extremely fast. it was nothing like anything i have ever seen. it was so fast, from my viewpoint i only saw it for about 20-30 seconds and then it was gone.

content.detailedDescription:
At approximately 0050 local time i was looking out my kitchen window which faces in he direction of the western sky. the sky condition were mostly clear with only a few widely scattered clouds that were being illuminated by the moon's light.

i was puzzled why my exterior motion lighting had illuminated and tried to override the automatic function and reset the exterior lights to off. approximately 30 seconds after i reset the exterior lights they came back on and almost immediately i witnessed an an intense blue colored light that increased in intensity quickly and had the appearance of lightning in its flashing behavior. it appeared to be located at a direction of approximately 330 deg (compass coordinates relative to my position) and the movement appeared to be approximately a west to east direction at a rapid speed. 

the intensity of the light was such that the mountains and sky to the west, which includes the sandwich range and mount chocorua also illuminated. furthermore, the lighting and flashing also had the appearance of a meteor/fireball entry.
 
video surveillance of the time of incident, indicates a series of flashes increasing in intensity. the shadows created by the trees and reflected off several surfaces from the intense blue light are visible and indicate relative movement in a west to east direction. additionally, the surveillance video also shows the western sky illuminating and making a mountain to the west visible.
content.summary: Intense flashing blue illumination

content.detailedDescription: I was not sleeping, huge white light into face from window facing the north, thought it was a flashlight but i'm on second floor of house. it was bluish, white ball, little red around it, spiraling down to the ground. as big as a large utility truck or van size. flare followed it in sky, smoke trail. it was brighter than brightest light, reflective inside ball and shone brighter as it spiraled down. thought we were going to war. i've seen flash bangs before, flares, no bang or sounds with this and barely any red to object . thought maybe meteorite? the object landed. i will check area in the am, but was seen as far away as lewiston and augusta. fb friends have witnessed it also.
content.summary: Huge fireball of bluish white light, reflecting, turning as spiraled down to the ground, i drove around but no burning anywhere, smoke trail in sky, helo flew by from west to east about 2 min after, i watched clock. 12:52 am happened.

content.detailedDescription: It waswas at night we were fishing at our pond about 10 pm my bro and my nephew and his freind and my youngest  girl but i have more that has hapend all my life it has been a long and life going thing i did not want  to tell anyone but  now i am older i can i dont have time for this to talk and tell you all on here night.
content.summary: I  do not have  time for this if you want to know all i have seen well you call me if not its cool i cant type very good cant see as well as i use to night

content.detailedDescription:
Would be nice if you had a form for implants, as there is so much that does not apply.

while walking, i was streaming audio, and noticed that is started 'hiccuping'. when i changed to my right arm, the interference stopped & the stream was normal. i thought that was odd, so i switched back. when holding in my left hand, the mangled interference began again.

i paused for a moment, listening to the mangled signal, then switched back to my right arm, and the signal was clear again. convinced it had to do with my arm, and not anything else, i walked & listened for a while to avoid the interruptions. then it dawned on me that there should not be an abnormal anomaly like this in my left arm, so i switched my cellphone back to my left arm again, and once more the signal was not clean.

i have reported an event before, july 2008 or 2009, can't remember now, i've been having memory issues that have only started recently.

my concern is that there may be something in my left arm that is interrupting normal signal, or rather a possible implant.

i'd consider someone who was able to detect this, to see if indeed there is a device in my left arm. x-ray, maybe someone who can test signal interruption, and if it were found, would consider welcoming removal.
content.summary: Disruption of cellular signal, only when held by left hand

content.detailedDescription: I was travelling from tenby south wales to carmarthen on the a477 a craft like a cigar pure white in colour appeared out of nowhere in the sky ahead of me at cloud level. it was big like a plane but it appeared white very bright with no markings. i watched expecting to see wings as it turned but then several more appeared out of nowhere behind it all in a line following each other all exactly the same size and colour. i was startled now as more and more appeared. out of nowhere i counted 17 then lost track as several other craft appeared from nowhere and flew at the side of the line of craft but these rocked side to side like they were swinging on a piece of string. i tried to get my phone out of my pocket to take a picture but they turned in the direction i was going and vanished one by one like they just disappeared into thin air. they made no sound at all .I had my van window open all the only noise was from the few cars in front of my vehicle. it scared me when i thought about it after arriving in carmarthen and couldn't stop looking up at the skydive checked news and radio but nothing. no reports ? i haven't told anyone as i'm scared of being laughed at but i've seen these craft and can't believe nobody else has reported it. hope i'm not going nuts? i've been expecting reports on the news but nothing at all! now i find myself watching the sky...Have done all day. i don't know if anybody in the cars in front of me saw them so i don't have any witness to back me up nor any pics...I'm gutted i didn't get any pics or film of them.
content.summary: Crafts appeared from nowhere flew past me left to right as i observed them in a straight line then joined by several other craft which flew at the side of line rocking side to side .They then turned sharply and went in same direction i was travelling.

content.detailedDescription:
1. driving home from work, heading north on bayview avenue just south of john street. 
2. object seemingly appeared from nowhere. shot out into air space over road. very bright object against dark sky. hard to miss.
3. originally thought it was a remote-controlled airplane or toy of sorts. seemed very close to ground. expected to see it fly back out over the road, or maybe see it and it's owners by the side of the road as i drove by, but nothing was there.
4. long, white, cigar-shaped object. bright white. looked lit up, too brightly to be reflection of street lights. almost glowing. aura surrounding it. never seen a remote-controlled airplane like this. seemed to appear from nowhere, shot out into the road really quickly. hovered above the right-most lane of bayview ave. for maybe 10 seconds, then made a very sharp turn and travelled east, disappearing from view.
5. confused. shocked. excited. driving and in a rush to get home on time so didn't really consider pulling over, though i regret it now. was not able to get a photo or video-regret this also.
6. shot east very quickly and disappeared as far as i was able to tell.
content.flightPath: Hovering then path,Path with directional change
content.summary: Long, white, cigar-shaped object. bright white. appeared from nowhere, shot out into the road really quickly. hovered above the right-most lane of bayview ave. for maybe 10 seconds, then made a very sharp turn and travelled east, disappearing from view.

content.detailedDescription: I was working at a gas bar in 1973. sitting at my desk near the window i noticed what i thought was a small cloud shimmering in the sunset. as the other clouds drifted off over the horizon this on small shimmering cloud hovered in one spot. i went out to get a better look and that's when it started shooting silvery flames from the top and bottom about 20 feet. it looked like a mirror the way both flames acted identically and for the same duration, twice pre second. i felt very intimidated alone and isolated. i called the local radio station and asked if anyone reported a ufo, he said he had received another call. i said look out your window and you will see it. he came back on the radio and announced he also had seen the ufo. that was enough for me i called home and told my parents the object just started moving towards our house to go out and wait for it. i closed the station as soon as i saw it move off and when i got home about 10 minutes later it was dark and the whole community was outside talking about it and my parents said it was a triangle shape with 3 bright lights underneath it, no sound. moments later 3 helicopter's flew over it the same direction and altitude. i was interview by cjoh by phone and described what i saw. it was seen by at least 40 people in our area.
content.summary: Hovering craft with flames shooting from top and bottom

content.detailedDescription: Approx. 2am, very loud, awoke us from sleeping. new immediately this is not a plane or helicopter as it had been hovering and is still hovering in our back yard. others who live in the area can also still hear and saw the object. it has been constantly hovering over the trees in our backyard all night. the lights were round, flashing in a circular motion. the shape of the object was tilted to the side with the lights going around in circles making a very loud noise. the object is out of sight but is still in our yard projecting the same noise.
content.summary: Still in back yard

content.altitude: Over 500 Feet (under cloudcover), Over 500 Feet (no cloudcover)
content.detailedDescription:
I was sort of "compelled" or "told" to look out my window last night right before i fell asleep. (ive got this weird intuition thing) it was 1:40am on the dot (eastern time) and i seen 3 bright "star-shaped" orbs that formed a triangle. i immediately grabbed my phone recognizing the bright light these "orbs" gave off. i got quite a few different types of pictures of this thing. i dont know what to call it seeing as it has 3 main lights/orbs that form a triangle and then each corner of that triangle has its own triangle but with these dark/black orbs which youll see from the image(s). this isnt the first time ive got pictures of these odd orbs but it is the first time ive seen the larger triangle made of the 3 larger lights. i get no special feelings besides chills after i was once again correct about the "feeling" that something was going to be in the sky. i just call it intuition which ive only had for about a year and a half now. does it have something to do with my third-eye being opened so young? 

i ended up taking a few pictures and hearing things walk around outside in my yard and told myself to call it quits. i got a drink of water and was about to go to bed again and i looked one final time. it flashed at me and then "went out". the thing literally winked at me and then it was gone. 

i attached 2 pictures of a similar experiance but this was only a single "orb" with the two black "orbs" surrounding it. if somebody could help explain exactly what i saw thatd be awesome. im pretty confused on the black orb thingies if the bright orbs/lights are part of a ship or something.
content.summary: 3 bright "star-shaped" orbs formed a triangle. the luminosity varied.

content.detailedDescription:
G'day my name is rod and i enjoy taking sunset pics from my front porch and as i took 1 particular pic i noticed thru my view finder on the camera that i had the green lights on indicating that the auto focus and flash were ready when a white light appear above these 2 lights.I pressed the shutter button and then looked to see what caused the white light.I could not see anything.
i eventually downloaded the pics onto my pc. as i scrolled thru my pics i noticed a white dot. i enlarged it to reveal a whitish sphere. unfortunately i saved the enlargement without making a copy.
this made me check all my sunset pics and found more "dots" that when enlarged revealed more of the same "dots".
i simply don't know what these are.
i realize there are reflections etc that can cause these but there is noting to reflect off.
content.summary: Ranged from shiny sphere to see thru spere

content.detailedDescription:
My wife and i were on the balcony second floor of a condo we rented. the orange colered lights appeared for 3 nights in a row around 8:30. i set up my nikon d5300 with a nikon wide angle lens set at infinity on focus. i have taken many many photos and video during the day so night time photography i did the best i can. the main video as a number of incidents at around 5 to 6 minutes in and a lot in the last minute. i have cropped the video (available if needed) and they looked like nothing i have seen before. the video is in 1080p so i was able to blow it up pretty good despite the distance. i am sending you the original mov which is 10 minutes long. there may be other incidents in the video but i tried to lighten it and screw around with colors etc. i didn't see anything else in the video.

talking to a number of people and googling nmb sc on line i have found this has been going on there for years. 100's of people have seen these. i set up for the third night with my camera for some high quality photos raw and with a 300 zoom lens. i couldnt get any shots because they moved around so much and it was so dark. 

this has change my life and is a very profound event for me and my wife. i have always been involved in science and stars etc. all my life (im 65) i have always be sceptical of reports from people. all of a sudden more and more professional people, cops, pilots, politicians etc are reporting  sightings. i said to my self a number of times why didnt they get way better video/photos in this day and age. that answer came to me when i tried to photograph and take video of the event we saw. 

my motto has always been "i'm from missouri show me!" i have been shown.
content.summary: Over the atlantic ocean just off the beach.

content.detailedDescription:
Boyfriend was driving south on rt. 11 from watertown to adams. at about 11:45ish we saw lights on the road up ahead and the picture just didn't make sense to us. at first it looked to me like maybe a fire truck up ahead or something but the closer we got the less sense the image we were seeing made. we continued in their direction, and came up on them fast, within seconds. 

they were in fact closer to us than i thought, maybe a quarter mile from where we first noticed the lights. we had to slow down fast or we would have driven right underneath and past them. boyfriend came to a stop so these things were drifting across the road right in front of us. we were driving south on rt. 11 so they were drifting across the road in a south/west direction, and right over the road in front of us they turned around and drifted back the direction they had been coming from; north/east. because they turned around in front of us we got to see just about every angle of these things except the top, so it was not an optical illusion and we could tell how close they were to each other and to us. we saw them up close, clearly, and in 3d. 

it was dark, but there were street lights and our headlights and they had blinking lights, red and white only, the whole time we saw them. i had turned off the heat and radio as we came upon them, and i immediately stuck my head right out the window for the best angle, and two things struck me right away. first; the silence. they made no noise that i could detect above the noise of our vehicle, which is not loud. second; their proximity to each other. they were so close together i would think they would be bumping into each other. when they turned around i thought we were going to witness a crash, they were only a few feet from each other. and they never split up when they were in our sights, but they moved independently, not like they were attached. 

the craft were about the size of limousines, lazily floating over the road not far above the telephone polls. they were both triangular, but they were not the same. one was a wider triangle, like you might picture a military drone or something, but the other one was a skinny pointy triangle. both had, i believe, red blinking lights in the front corner on the bottom, and white blinking lights on the side corners on the bottom.

 besides being triangular in shape and the lights, they were completely featureless, at least from the bottom and sides. just perfect triangles, no other angles or patterns at all. just black. like even any drones i look up that belong to any military or even anything out of popular science, nothing i've seen is a perfect triangle like that, they all have some other angles, discernable wings, engines, something. they were both like that, exactly the same except for the shape of the triangle. we were so close that if there was any other detail to notice in their shape, we would have seen it. we should have been able to see detail but it was just their outlines, the lights, and flat matte black. there were stars out and they blocked their light, blocked the lighter color of the horizon behind them. there was no light reflecting off them, and there should have been. there were all these lights like i said, and not one glimmer of a reflection off any part of them. and the lights that came off them were bright but not blinding; there was no glare, even so close. and my eyes have a problem with glare and bright lights. but not these. 

after they turned around and we just gawked for what seemed like minutes but must have been seconds, a spotlight shown coming from the side of i think the skinny one, right off the tip of the wing or side corner of the triangle. it shown in our direction but i think it shown over us not right on us... and then they were drifting over the trees back in the direction they seemed to have come from. 

i told boyfriend to hurry up and chase them and not to lose them. i kept my eyes on them and could see the lights through the trees, directed boyfriend where to go, but i lost them through the trees. i could see them and then they were just nowhere. 

boyfriend took a route that should have cut them off if they had continued their speed and direction, and we drove around with my head out the moon roof searching and finding hilltops to search the horizons, but nothing, they were gone. then we drove around looking for a cop car but wouldn't you know it when you actually need one they are nowhere to be found. we finally gave up and went home and i think it was close to 1am.

i was determined to alert authorities. i knew they wouldn't exactly believe us, or do anything about it, but i just wanted it on record, wanted someone to know that happened, and i'm just so curious, and i was hoping that we wouldn't be the only ones! i figured they would get more calls, more reports. i thought with them being right above the ground and apparently in no hurry, someone else around must have noticed something. its a rural area but right smack in between adams and adams center. 

i called the jefferson county police but the state troopers showed up first. the troopers said they would check around with fort drum and stuff and were nice but obviously didn't take it very seriously, which is the best i really expected... i'm just hoping something else turns up... i want some more news... 

even if it isn't extra terrestrial drones or something, it still had to be some sort of secret technology or something that not many people have witnessed, and that's still amazing to me. 

going about normal everyday life feels so weird now... like i'm the only one freaking out inside about this... i'm thankful for the experience but i hope someone else out there experiences it too. i'm so glad boyfriend was there to witness it too, but i just can't stop thinking about it and i think he just wants to forget it. i can't and don't want to. i want to know more. 

this all happened monday night/tuesday morning. 5/9/16-5/10/16
content.summary: Two limousine size black triangles, one skinny one wide, with red and white blinking lights, silently slowly floated over the road and telephone polls, turned around, shone a light, slowly floated away over treetops.

content.detailedDescription: Standing outside smoking. noticed two craft after plane traffic died. saw them streak by really close to each other.  i am an air force veteran who worked on aircraft weapon systems for 8 years. i know what is a ts craft and what is considered a loaded airframe. this wasn't like any aircraft flying commercially. was not tr3b. seemed like the us because they fly in twos. one to observe one to attack. not sure what it was but i know they were using ant grav prepulsion. they seemed to follow us 35 north into oklahoma.
content.summary: Saw 2 craft in formation traveling at speeds faster than conventional aircraft.

content.detailedDescription:
On june 7th 2014 two sightings have occurred , one in the afternoon near the sun on a clear sunny day @ 4:42:43 pm & then in the evening near / at moon area @ 8:17:24 pm , took photos of both .

* the daytime ufo is in a pink colour with strange looking folds & round "buttons" within it .

* the evening ufo flew over quickly (i noticed it in the corner of my eye) & took a photo in that direction where it flew to , near the moon or it covered the moon itself as it appears on the photo ,
it was white in flight like a large orb but on the photo up-close on it at the top of it there are several green metallic looking triangles , as if they were sitting right on top of it . 

these photos were taken with a digital camera .

other then that i don't recall much of the sightings itself , perhaps because of the time that has passed since then or for other reasons .
content.summary: On june 7th 2014 consists of 2 sightings at two different time frames

content.detailedDescription:
I was stargazing and saw a bright blue light in the sky that dropped some sort of beam and then i saw an unknown humanoid's shadow and a distorted laugh
i felt unable to move but plucked up the courage to go back inside the watched the object in the sky disapear
content.summary: Ufo then unknown shadow and laugh

content.detailedDescription: I was abducted by entity group including the police, psychiatrists doctors. they carried out unclear assessment on me afterwards then dropped in a mental health hospital. where the ufo operations have been taking place in my environment. since  26/04/2016.They have been using different weapons on me that can kill me. including fries guns that burning me from my head to toe. because the police are involved in the criminals activities very difficult for me to get help.  before this entity group visited my address on the 26/04/2026, they were already entrapped me in the address that i provided in this report. and the operations of harassment including ufo operations used on me to turture me and frustrating me psychologically. and including terrorist attacks.  their operations never stop in the hospital, they continue the ufo operation.  when i called out for help, they told the people that trying to help me that i have mental health problems. these criminals never say exact damage they are causing to my body and my health.  because of the nature of the crime so very easy for them to deny and manipulate people that the crime is not taking place.  i am the witness of my crime there is no any witness rather than the people that abducted me in the building. and there no any cameral fixing in the hospital to record the crime event. the experience is an horrific event. and all the criminals in the abuse activities trying everything they can do to cover up the crime.
content.summary: Kidnapped and abducted by th entity including the police, local authority and the mental health hospital.

content.detailedDescription:
It was still daylight and we were caterers leaving an event in inverness, fl. three of us in the truck, we saw what looked like white landing lights from a jet. but there was no large airport in the area. we stopped at the stop sign and watched the "craft" approach. it decended over the high school & football field at approx. 500 feet. it was huge and had other red and blue lights on booms or cranes sticking out from the base. the base was black and looked just like an off-shore oil rig without legs flying over us. it crossed the road and seem to disappear behind the trees. i looked down at the road and realized i was stopped in street, but so were about 25 to 30 other vehicles. some had pulled onto the grass. i was, i guess confused at seeing something like that in the air. it is hard to make your brain accept what you are seeing. i had a camera in the truck, but it didn't even occur to me to photograph what we were seeing. we got back to the catering shop. none of us spoke a word all the way back. and i asked the other two employees to draw a picture of what they saw. the next day we compared the drawings, and we all saw the same thing.

exactly a month later on april 16th, 1993, one of the other witnesses came rushing in to show me a newspaper article about a police officer in the next county who saw the same thing along the coast of the gulf of mexico. his description was identical to ours, but other than that article, nothing showed up in the news.  it was daylight as well when the officer saw this.

i have always wondered what that could have been, even now 20 some years later.
content.summary: White landing lights looked like plane at first, then closer looked just like an oil rig with no legs

content.detailedDescription:
Went outside for a smoke  beautiful clear night no street lights so very detailed sky. finished smoke and decided to stay outside a while and take in the scenery. was probly out there another 20  min  when what looked like a plane flying past high in the sky as a plane normly would suddenlly went 4 directions all at once,up dwn, side to side very sharply and quickly. simlar to a fly or a bee. then suddenly, like a couple of shooting stars, another two objects fly in, they appeared like shooting stars .  it look like the two objects were chasing the first  object i saw. they were shooting smtn towards the other object. the object was avoiding, dissapearing, reapearing like i said like a couple bees chasing eachother this went on 4 20 mins or so.
this not the first time i have expieranced this, 6 years ago i witnessed a simlar thing. i was absoloutly terified. since that day ive cme to terms with it,that theres stuff going ln up there that i cnt expain i stayed and watched in awe this time. the first time i ran away in fear after a couple min.
content.flightPath: Hovering then path,Path with directional change,Path then hovering,Other
content.summary: 3 lights buzzing around like flies shoting prejectiles dissapearing then appearing again changing direction sharply and at speed

content.detailedDescription: Ich war noch spt auf und schaute fernsehen als ich das gefhl bekaum ich msste irgendwas oder wen treffen.Und ging spazieren zu einem bestimmten punkt .Ich wurde wie geleitet zu einer sparkasse in unserem dorf dort war der treffpunkt fhlte ich.Und ich setzte mich vor dem gebude auf eine bank.Dort hatte ich das gefhl ich werde beobachtet von sogennannten ich nenne sie schatten zwei stck im augenwinkel sah ich ein flimmern in der grsse von personen wie gepixelte umrisse aber nur kurz oder unbewusst wahrnehmbar.Im sitzen kam ein insect die hose hochgekrabbelt und setzte sich in meinen schoss es war 6bis 8mm gross und haarig sibern funkelnt in dem licht der laterne es hatte 2 kpfe einem an jedem ende mit jeweils einem fhlerpaasr und sechs beinen ,es blieb 5 min sitzen ungefhrb ich hatte kein zeitgefhl dafr mehr .Es liess sich anschauen und krabbelte dann von meinem schoss wieder zu boden und verschwand.Die zwei schatten auch.Ich ging wieder nach hause einen tag sptwer sah ich 4 lichter ber unserem haus in kreuzform angeordnet 5bis 8 min dann verschwanden sie. ich habe im internet nach dieser lebensform gesucht und fand eine hhlenzeichnung der hopi indianer in den usa die diese lebensform darstellte sie heissen ant people und sind angeblich mehrdimensional.Ich schwre das sich das so zugetragen hat.Seit dem habe ich nirgens hnliche insecten gesehen.
content.summary: Es waren 4 kleine lichter ber meinem haus in 4m abstand in kreuzformation.

content.detailedDescription:
It was about 5 minutes after midnight on january 1st 2015. i went out to see if there was any fireworks in view from my backyard. as i stood there looking at the night sky, i witnessed 3 red orbs coming towards me. they moved from west to north east. they were a solid red glow, no noise of any kind, silent. two of them went over the high school next door to me, and the third came within 20 meters of where i stood watching them. it was about 15 feet off the ground, and maneuvered between the powerlines, trees and apartment buildings. as it moved through the area, it actually maneuvered through the parking lot through the trees and then moved up in the air to continue over the hill on the other side of the road.  i am a sky watcher anyway..., we have a lot of planes come over my apartment complex because we are in a flight path for the st. louis airport just 15 minutes down the highway.  i know what an approaching airplane looks like. these orbs were not planes!  i wasn't sure what these orbs were when i first noticed them coming my way.  i realized i had seen orbs in the sky before, but assumed they were a plane off in the distance, even though they did not move and then disappeared.

as i stood there watching these three orbs, i just remember thinking it was interesting because as close as the one was to me, there was absolutely no noise, no wind, and it seemed like it was " on a mission" for lack of a better reason behind its purpose. i didn't have an fear, only curiosity about them.  after watching them disappear, i assumed maybe it was the police of st charles, or the government using drones to monitor the area.  i did tell my neighbors about them, and my mother. but then just let it be assuming they were drones.

but then i had another experience with them on may 3rd 2016 around 1 am. i had awoke from a restless sleep, and decided to go out for a smoke. ( i don't smoke in my residence, therefore..., no matter the hour or weather..., i go outside to smoke) i was standing there and staring at the skies as i so often do.  again, i witnessed 3 red orbs coming towards me. 1 went over the high school, and the other two were lower to the ground (about 15 feet up), as they went by. the two closest to me were about 20 meters away again.  again they were silent, and again the two closet to me maneuvered through the powerlines and then the parking lot trees, and buildings, turning slightly to the left to avoid anything along their path.

both times i finally lost sight as they went over the hill across the street from my apartment complex.

maybe these were drones? i don't know. i just know i thought it was odd, and especially with no sound coming from them...., and the fact that they could maneuver through things along their path made me question what they could possibly be.  i would be very curious to know. any information you might have on other sighting such as these in my area, would be greatly appreciated.

i have not found anyone else in my area who has witnessed what have have seen on this two occasions.

thank you for giving me the opportunity and a place to share my experience with you. i was feeling rather alone with this! :)
content.summary: 3 orbs passed within 20 meters of me at about 25 ft high

content.detailedDescription: My husband was on the back porch, came rushing through the house to the front deck saying there were 2 orange ufos.  we were both looking south, one ufo was over portage island, another ufo was behind it over south lummi island, they were round, bright orange-red, slowly moving north. i quickly grabbed my sons camera off the table, it's right by the front door, made sure the the flash was off, and quickly took 2 pictures, right after the second picture both ufos disappeared heading south.  the camera was slow to take pictures because it was dark and trying to focus (i tried to focus on the ufo in front), so there is camera shake, but it does show how bright the ufos were.
content.summary: 2 ufos over portage island and lummi island

content.detailedDescription: Ich war noch wach um 2 uhr nachts und bekam das gefhl das ich los muss raus spazieren und mich mit irgendwehn oder was zu treffen an einem bestimmten treffpunkt und ging dann ziehlstrebig zu unserer sparkasse.Wo eine bank dabvor steht.Ich wusste das es hier der richtige ort war und hatte das gefhl das 1 oder mehrere personen hinter mir standen"shadows" die das ganze beobachteten oder berwachen im augenwinkel sah ich machnmal unklare umrisse die gepixelt waren wie von einem tarnschild. dann setzte ich mich auf die bank und an meinem hosenbein lief das insect hoch und setzte sicgh auf meinen schoss und blieb das sitzen es war 8 bis 10mm gross und war haarig mit hrchen die ungefhr 3mm lnge hatten glnzte sibern und funkelte im licht der laterne.Es hatte 2 kpfe mit fhlern uns sechs beine.Es lies sich anschauen und nach 5 bis 10 min ich hatte kein zeitgefhl verschwand es wieder kletterte von meinem hosen bein runter und verschwand unter der bank ich weiss nicht wohin .Dann ging ich wieder heim .Und sah die tage darauf weiss nicht mehr wann genau es war nachts kleine bunte lichter ber meinem haus sie waren grn blau gelb und rot und verschwanden nach 3 bis 5 min.
content.summary: Ich sah das insect und es kletterte auf meine hose weil ich gesessen habe und verschwand nach 5 bis 10 min

content.detailedDescription: Ich war auf der strasse bei meiner oma und wollte nach hause fahren und schaute in den himmel und sah 8 bis 10 dreieckige ufos ohne lichter in v formation in ungefhr 500 bis 800 m hhe schweben die nach 5 min sich auflsten stelthmode und verschwanden.
content.summary: Flieing in v formation 8 or 10  and disappert after 5 min in stelth mode unseen

content.detailedDescription:
I was talking on the phone, and i went outside to jump on the trampoline because i was bored. while jumping and talking on the phone, i looked up (because once again, im outside and im bored). and i saw a glowly object, it was like chrome.  it was half transparent and resembled the moon.
i first thought i was just tripping out it was the moon. however, it couldn't be the moon, because it was only 3 o'clock and it was at an impossible angle. i told the person on the phone what i was seeing, obviously she didn't believe me and told me to send a picture. while i was explaining, the ufo seemed to be.. lost. like it moved left, then right, then left. like it was confused or pivoting itself around. i was next to a treeline (to my left, facing the ufo). i felt kinda confused, but at the same time excited with curiosity. i put the phone on speaker and pulled out the camera app. but.. it wasn't in there. like, it was not in my fov of the camera. i even did my best to match it up with the clouds. it was as if it wasn't even there, inside the camera. like the camera just ignored it. i was shocked. i took photos anyway, but to my disappointment, it wasn't there. i then saw it hover in place for a few seconds, when suddenly 4 or so jets/planes came from the south (of me, not the actual south. i was facing the aircraft). they zoomed toward the direction i was facing, and the aircraft followed them and i lost sight of them because of the treeline. it was about 1-2 years ago. i just never told anyone because i knew no one would believe me. i had no evidence.
content.flightPath: Stationary,Hovering then path,Path with directional change,Path then hovering
content.summary: Saw hovering orb. changed direction like it couldnt decide where to go. followed up by multiple jets, then followed jets.

content.detailedDescription: Strange occurrences between feb. 10th and feb. 20th that some would ascribe to "mental illness", lack of sleep. one night closer to the 20th i felt communication with aliens.  i was watching x-files and last man on earth during that time.
content.summary: I was with my 2 sons, ages 7 and 4, who have autism, trying to get them asleep when i saw a light outside their window in the sky past the trees

content.detailedDescription:
I was camping alone, and went for late night walk by river...It was cloudless and hot, with a full moon...I took a shot of the bright moon,then noticed the craft.  it remained, and faded out.

when i checked my camera later, i saw the orbs, and boosted contrast to highlight them...There was also no stars in the shot, but in the middle of the wilderness, there was no light pollution, and the stars returned in abundance...It was like the craft projected a field...The orb across from the ufo shows what looks like city, something very strange.
content.summary: It watched me, and showed orbs, some geometrical,some with buildings inside

content.detailedDescription: I was looking at this silver metallic object moving across the sky. it was moving way to fast to be a plane or a silver metallic looking balloons. shortly right after, i felt something on my finger, like a burning feeling or something was biting me. looking at my fingers, i counted six bees on my hand, but only one got the stinger in my finger. the rest of them, were trying to land on my hand.. what was that about..
content.summary: Silver metallic object moving across the sky.
